amendment.description: To establish additional education and training requirements for the National Intelligence Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3756 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3756 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S10250; text: CR S10250) To establish additional education and training requirements for the National Intelligence Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3756 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3756 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Graham FL.
